article_title: California Senate Votes To Open Up Obamacare To 2.5 Million Illegal Residents

article_metadata.author: Robert Laszewski

og.description: King V. Burwell opponents said killing subsidies would blow up Obamacare­­--now in California they want to open up unsubsidized care to illegal Californians. State Senator Richard Lara has already moved a bill through the California State Senate that would allow illegal immigrants to buy unsubsidized health insurance in the state’s Obamacare [...]
